alert.note: Alert for Clark (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 26 at 4:03PM PDT until July 26 at 6:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall. * WHERE...A portion of southern Nevada, including the following county, Clark. * WHEN...Until 530 PM PDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 403 PM PDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain from earlier thunderstorms had produced between 1 and 2 inches of rain in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Goodsprings, Goodsprings Road, and Sandy Valley Road. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
